charinfo.name: Mitarashi Anko
charinfo.description: A former student of Orochimaru and bearer of the Cursed Seal, Anko is now a teacher at Konoha. Having learned from Orochimaru, Anko utilizes various types of poisons and forbidden techniques to dismantle her enemies.

abilities.name: Dual Pin
abilities.description: Anko deals 5 damage to one enemy and for 1 turn, they will be unable to reduce damage or become invulnerable. The following turn, 'Dragon Fire' will be replaced by 'Twin Snakes Mutual Death'.

abilities.name: Twin Snakes Mutual Death
abilities.description: Anko delivers a large dose of poison to both herself and one enemy affected by 'Dual Pin', instantly killing both targets. This skill cannot be ignored.

abilities.name: Dragon Fire
abilities.description: Anko scorches the battlefield with fire, dealing 10 affliction damage to all enemies for 2 turns. The following 2 turns, those enemies will also receive an additional 5 damage from all other damage that Anko deals.

abilities.name: Hidden Shadow Snake Hands
abilities.description: Anko releases a number of snakes that attack one enemy, dealing an initial 20 damage to them. The following 3 turns, that enemy will receive 5 affliction damage each turn.*

abilities.name: Quick Reflexes
abilities.description: This skill makes Mitarashi Anko invulnerable for 1 turn.
